name: fireflies
description: Get fireflies meeting notes in Twenty

FIREFLIES_WEBHOOK_SECRET.description: Secret key for validating Fireflies webhooks

FIREFLIES_PLAN_LEVEL.description: Fireflies plan level: free, pro, enterprise

TWENTY_API_KEY.description: Twenty CRM API key for authentication

AUTO_CREATE_CONTACTS.description: Automatically create contacts for unknown participants (true/false)

FIREFLIES_SUMMARY_STRATEGY.description: Summary fetch strategy: immediate_only, immediate_with_retry, delayed_polling, or basic_only

FIREFLIES_RETRY_ATTEMPTS.description: Number of retry attempts when fetching summaries

FIREFLIES_RETRY_DELAY.description: Delay in milliseconds between retry attempts

FIREFLIES_POLL_INTERVAL.description: Polling interval (ms) when using delayed polling strategy

FIREFLIES_MAX_POLLS.description: Maximum number of polling attempts when waiting for summaries

FIREFLIES_MAX_RETRY_ATTEMPTS.description: Maximum number of retry attempts when waiting for summaries

FIREFLIES_MAX_POLL_INTERVAL.description: Maximum polling interval (ms) when waiting for summaries
